projects.name: Melody Star
projects.text: Melody Star was a rythym/piano-playing game developed by Georgia Tech students through the VGDev club. I contributed the art, story and writing for the pixel art band.

projects.name: Lunacia
projects.text: Lunancia is a relaxed adventure game. The player controls a young girl exploring the depths of her psyche by flying around several levels. I contributed code for the character controls and Beholder enemy with other members of Georgia Tech VGDev.
